instruction: Help the user decide which online course platform to use by providing three advantages and three disadvantages for each platform.
output:
Coursera:
Advantages: 
1. Offers courses from top universities and industry leaders
2. Provides regular assessments and peer-reviews
3. Allows users to interact directly with professors

Disadvantages:
1. Course materials can be expensive 
2. Not all courses require certification
3. Technical requirements for access to some courses 

Udemy:
Advantages: 
1. More affordable than Coursera
2. Some courses offer certification after completion
3. Can access course materials anytime and anywhere 

Disadvantages:
1. Quality of courses can be lacking
2. Fewer courses than Coursera 
3. Little to no assessment or peer review
